choiceresponse.p: In Trainingland, navigate to the “HIV District (SNU2)” dashboard. Find the map “HIV - ART retention rate by user and sub-orgunits - 2021” and use the context menu to open it in the Maps app. In one of the thematic layers, click on the Style tab.

label.h3: Which of the following style options have been selected for this map?

div.p: This map visualization uses a choropleth map with a predefined color legend and “HIV default (%)” selected as the legend set.
